txt.en: 'I will hold the gate... go now and seek Laerdan.'
'Éin does not wish to be disturbed.'
'Ah, fresh blood has finally arrived!'
Defeated Éin
'What has happened here? Where is Laerdan?'
'Intruders! Get them!'
'I trust the few men left to me were not too troublesome?'
'One of Laerdan's knives... we must return this to Calenglad.'
'I was instructed to give you a special message, a token from my mistress.'
You have learned that Laerdan was not slain and was kept in Barad Tironn for questioning.
'But it has been so lonesome since they took the Elf away to Angmar.'
'I must have some amusement before I send you on your way!'
'We have arrived safely, but I fear that the Enemy may be close upon our heels.'
Enter Barad Tironn and speak to Forchon.
'We must leave quickly before our presence is known, [placeholder].'
Enter Barad Tironn and find Laerdan.
Wait for Forchon in Barad Tironn
Find Laerdan
Wait for Forchon
Instance: Barad Tironn
